Name: Standard Legend
About the game: Standard Legend is a two-dimensional 2D platform game. Plot: You play as a glorious knight named Rooster, our hero will have to save the princess from the clutches of the dragon. As in any such story, the robbers, evil spirits and the dragon itself, of course, will try to prevent him from being tested on the way to the ladies heart.
